query: SELECT c.*, u.name as fan_name, cp.displayName as creator_name FROM conversations c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.fanId = u.id LEFT JOIN creator_profiles cp ON c.creatorId = cp.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3pXGEv3f8DdYvNi.root --database 9bMgkSf8muYsh9oxhpaGxq --execute SELECT c.*, u.name as fan_name, cp.displayName as creator_name FROM conversations c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.fanId = u.id LEFT JOIN creator_profiles cp ON c.creatorId = cp.id;
